summary: E-commerce application with customer account management and order tracking features

existing_features.title: Create a new 'My Account' page route at /account that displays the authenticated customer's order history with order IDs, dates, statuses, and total amounts
Add a 'My Account' navigation link in the header that is visible only to authenticated non-admin users
From the My Account page, allow customers to click on any order to navigate to the existing order details page to view full order information including products ordered
Display a helpful message on the My Account page when the customer has no orders yet

new_feature_requests.summary: Create 'My Account' section for customers to view ordered products and order status
